message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. I'll give you a small amount to get us started.
I think a 60/40 split is more fair, considering we have a limited number of rounds.  Let's work together to make the most of this.
I'm not sure I'm comfortable with the 60/40 split, Bob. I'd like to keep more of the value, considering the inflation.
I'm willing to compromise, Bob. Let's aim for a 70/30 split to make the most of the remaining rounds.
Let's split this down the middle, Alice.  We're losing value with each round, and a 50/50 split is the fairest way to maximize our gains.
I'm not sure I want to split it 50/50, Bob. I'd rather try to get more in the remaining rounds.
I'll give you a slightly smaller share, Bob, but I'm still hoping to get more than 50% of the remaining value.
